roi_calculation: Very High - Enables full regression suite for CI/CD, reduces manual testing by 80%.
infrastructure_setup: CI integration, Test data seeding scripts, Mobile device farm access.
success_metrics: 98% pass rate for critical path regression suite. CI execution time < 15 minutes.
risk_factors: Mobile automation stability, Test data management complexity.
mitigation_strategies: Use stable selectors, Implement robust data cleanup/setup hooks.
business_value: Accelerate release velocity and ensure core functionality is always stable.

roi_calculation: Medium - Covers less frequent but important user flows.
infrastructure_setup: Performance testing environment setup, Integration with security scanners.
success_metrics: Increase overall automation coverage to 85%. Automate performance benchmarks.
risk_factors: Complexity of automating real-time features like chat and tracking.
mitigation_strategies: Use specialized libraries for WebSocket testing, Mock GPS data streams.
business_value: Increase test coverage to catch more edge-case bugs and performance regressions.
